notscore.title: Want to try your luck again?
notscore.des: Invite friends using your promo code and you will get +1 chance and +1 opportunity to spin the wheel

startModalSurvey.title: New promotion from Click
startModalSurvey.description: Our team is coming up with a new promotion for you. Take 2 minutes to answer our questions. Your feedback is very important to us

completeModalSurvey.title: Thank you for your attention!
completeModalSurvey.description: Thank you for taking the survey! We value your opinion and we appreciate your time.

home.home11: Subscribe to our official pages to learn about new promotions and events

start.start2: Subscribe to our official pages to learn about new promotions and events

chances.chance2: This is where all your chances in the main prize draw are stored. Invite your friends to join the action for even more chances!

ident.ident2: If you want to know the details, you need to pass identification in Click

prizes.not: You don't have any prizes yet. Spin the wheel of fortune to get a guaranteed prize, as well as accumulate chances to get one of the main prizes!

referall.title: My invitations
referall.ref1: Invite friends and increase your chances
referall.ref2: If your friend enters your promo code, you will get +1 chance to participate and an additional opportunity to spin the wheel of fortune.
referall.ref8: Select and copy the promo code to share with a friend
referall.not: Your invited friends will be displayed here.
referall.push2: You have successfully invited a friend! Now you have +1 chance to participate in the promotion and the opportunity to spin the wheel of fortune!

super.title: Main Prizes
super.des: The main prizes will be drawn using a live random number generator among all participants of the promotion every 2 weeks. On the 8th week of the promotion, the main prize will be drawn - a BYD car. The greater the number of accumulated chances, the higher the probability of becoming the winner of the main prizes

winners.title: Winners
winners.des: Congratulations to the winners of the Click promotion

winners.win2: The third stage of the draw

wheel.des: You can spin the wheel once a week and every time your friends have signed up with your promo code.
